link_name: Zabbix template for Microsoft SQL Server Mini
link_desc:
Zabbix template for Microsoft SQL Server (MS SQL) for those, who need only MS SQL database engine service status and database status.

Features:

  • MS SQL instance Low Level Discovery.
  • MS SQL database Low Level Discovery.

Supported versions:

Tested on Microsoft SQL Server 2012, 2014 and 2016. It may work with earlier versions, but some items may be unsupported.

Tested on Zabbix 3.4.0. It may work with earlier versions, but some items (for example service.info[service,]) may be unsupported.

My other templates are here.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent Active|Custom Script
3.4: Zabbix template for Microsoft SQL Server DE Mini.zip
author: Mantas Tumenas
